27.eng-name: Chapters on Righteousness And Maintaining Good Relations With Relatives
27.ara-name: كتاب البر والصلة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that the Messenger of Allah said :"When a man was walking on the road, he found a thorny branch and removed it. Allah appreciated his action by forgiving him

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي إِمَاطَةِ الأَذَى عَنِ الطَّرِيقِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Removing Harm From The Road
